channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Security Verify Password Synchronization Plug-in for Windows AD
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Security Verify Password Synchronization Plug-in for Windows AD

item.title: CVE-2022-22323|2024-08-03T03:07:50.464Z -- ibm -- security%20verify%20password%20synchronization%20plug-in%20for%20windows%20ad
item.description: IBM Security Identity Manager (IBM Security Verify Password Synchronization Plug-in for Windows AD 10.x) is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by a heap-based buffer overflow in the Password Synch Plug-in. An authenticated attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause a denial of service. IBM X-Force ID: 218379.

item.title: CVE-2022-22312|2024-08-03T03:07:50.193Z -- ibm -- security%20verify%20password%20synchronization%20plug-in%20for%20windows%20ad
item.description: IBM Security Identity Manager (IBM Security Verify Password Synchronization Plug-in for Windows AD 10.x) is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by a heap-based buffer overflow in the Password Synch Plug-in. An authenticated attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause a denial of service. IBM X-Force ID: 217369.
